arm_group.description: patients with BPAW-M more than 15 or between 10 and 15, but with Tobin <100 will be weaned with the weaning protocol
patients with any BWAP-M will be weaned by clinical judgment

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to evaluate the difference of the duration of weaning process
      from the ventilator between protocol-driven weaned patients and clinical judgment driven
      weaned patients.

clinical_study.brief_title: Utility of a Weaning Protocol in ICU

detailed_description.textblock:
All patients with difficult weaning and who required tracheostomy are enrolled in the study.
      These patients are randomized as "Caso or Controllo" by a computer program. For all this
      patients are calculated modified-BWAP(BWAP-M) and TOBIN indexes. The "CASO" patients can
      start the weaning protocol process only if BWAP-M value is more than 15 or BWAP-M 10-15 with
      Tobin index < 100.

      If not, the BWAP-M and Tobin will be calculated every day. The Control patients will start
      weaning by clinical judgement even if the BWAP-M value is less than 10.

      For all patients are calculated: the duration of weaning process, the ICU length of stay and
      the duration of the mechanical ventilation.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  all patients that are clinically identified as difficult to wean and

          -  have failed 2 spontaneous breathing trials (tracheostomized)

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  patients that are clinically identified as easy to wean and

          -  have successfully passed 1 of the 2 spontaneous breathing trials

facility.name: 2° Servizio Di Anestesia E Rianimazione, Spedali Civili Di Brescia

clinical_study.official_title: Non Pharmacological Randomized Clinical Trial Designed to Evaluate the Difference of the Duration of Weaning Process From the Ventilator Between Protocol-driven Weaned Patients and Clinical-driven Weaned Patients.

other_outcome.time_frame: within the first 26 days (plus or minus 22 days) after ICU recovery

primary_outcome.time_frame: within the first 15 days (plus or minus 5 days) after start of weaning

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: within the first 12 days (plus or minus 10 days) after start of mechanical ventilation

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case Control, Time Perspective: Prospective
